task.title: How to Check In
task.shortdesc: Now that you have booked your classroom, here's what to do on check-in day.

context.p: Shanks Hall is located 181 Turner St. NW, Blacksburg, VA.

step.cmd: Enter Shanks Hall, and find the main office (room 323) on the third floor.
step.info: There is an elevator in the back of the first floor of Shanks.

step.cmd: Tell the person at the desk your information, and show them your receipt to get your key.

stepresult.p: You are now able to unlock your classroom.

steptroubleshooting.p: If the key does not work, be sure you are at the correct classroom.
If you are at the correct classroom, and the key still does not work, ask the person at the desk for assistance.
